hints: Neural Sync affects rare AFK materials and Cache. Keep it high before long sessions.
When Cache is blocked by low sync, it converts to brand_new_parts. Keep sync to earn Cache.
Memory and Cache serve different purposes. Check requirements before crafting or upgrades.
Overclocking passes shorten AFK duration. Use them when you need to finish early.
AFK rewards go to your inbox or inventory. Remember to check after it ends.
Blueprints are the main source of equipment. Most dungeon drops are for dismantling.
Workstation mood affects output. Give agents rest before long runs.
Global buffs are community triggered. Watch for active bonuses.
When rare materials are blocked by sync, they auto-convert to substitutes.
If your sync is low, running common resources is more efficient.
